content: fall in love with this lofty openwork crochet blanket that effortlessly combines luxury with comfort worked flat in plush bernat blanket mist-ical you ll do a selection of techniques including double_crochet chain spaces working in rounds for the border and more this lightweight yet cozy throw is perfect for staying warm without feeling weighed down materials bernet® blanket mist-ical® 300 g/10 5 oz 220 yds/201m sunshine 13011 4 balls or 807 yds/738 m measurements approx 44 x 50 112 x 127 cm
